thread.title: Good standard hotel
thread.title_full: Good standard hotel - Review of Days Inn Hotel New York City-Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: colinsabin1
title: Good standard hotel
text: I was very pleasantly suprised by this hotel. Had read a lot of not so good reviews after we had booked in but to be honest this is a good Base for me and my friends. Staff were very friendly and once we worked out which subway to catch we were only 10 min from times square. Would definitely stop here again. Is a good basic hotel.
